content: Yahoo! Promoting Video Search with an Awards Site Search Engines By: Rand Fishkin July 28, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin July 28, 2005 Yahoo! Promoting Video Search with an Awards Site Search Engines The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Yahoo! is promoting, on their homepage no less, a video contest where users send in their favorite short videos - the promotion specifically features one of a bulldog riding on a skateboard. The videos are then considered for an award named the "Yammy" in several different categories. As much as I love promotion via tactics like awards and creative, user-submitted content, this one's a bit cheesed out for me. I'm sure Yahoo! will have success with it, though. Note the double use of the new Yahoo! video search bar on the promotion page - very wily... Copied! Back to Top
